bike.description: FACT 11m carbon front triangle, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, full FACT rear triangle, tapered HT, carbon PF30 BB, ISCG ’05, Internal Command Post routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 130mm travel

components.description: Fox/Specialized remote Brain with AUTOSAG, Kashima coating, inertia valve w/Trail Tune, BrainFade adjust, 197x48mm, 29er hose length
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post BlackLite, 3 position, adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head 30.9mm, S:100mm travel, Others: 125mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual, mylar DT protector
